message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $140 given the value this item provides. Would that work for you?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I would like to offer $130. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
